The NC reviews the size of the Board on an annual basis. Based on the latest review, there was general agreement that the present Board size is appropriate and facilitates effective decision making, taking into account the nature and current scope of the Company’s operations, the requirements of the business of the Company and the need to avoid undue disruptions from changes to the composition of the Board and Board Committees.
